vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ῥύομαι,
see at {ἐρύω} (B). ῥύπα, τά, irregular plural of ῥύπος (which see).
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to rescue, deliver
to drag, out of danger, to rescue, save, deliver Mt. 6:13; 27:43; to be rescued, delivered, Lk. 1:74; Rom. 15:31; 2Thess. 3:2; 2Tim. 4:17
vocabInfos._es_Definition: salvar, rescatar, entregar ; el Libertador, el Salvador (ROM.11:26)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: cứu; cứu vớt, cứu rỗi; giải cứu, giải thoát.
